items.sentence: Tom says that he didn\'t study at all for the test.
Tom is still doing what he\'s supposed to be doing.
Tom is studying to become a physician\'s assistant.
Tom isn\'t likely to allow Mary to do that for him.
Tom drew a happy face on the cover of his notebook.
Tom had trouble understanding what Mary was saying.
I think that it\'s dangerous to swim in that river.
I thought that you\'d speak French better than Tom.
I thought you didn\'t know anything about lacrosse.
Tom looked around the room, but couldn\'t see Mary.
